code: import cartReducer from"./cartReducer";import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{persistStore,persistReducer,FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";var stripe=require("stripe")("sk_test_51MGebBKsOnWPzVqcN8JtfxI8QWpUqmaEtXhqF1yMEhBBQATA3soROcEXRF7tO12HZhKqHv8ZH5LsTeqVfaOckNqq00ZYQVt5Dk");var persistConfig={key:"root",version:1,storage:storage};var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,cartReducer);export var store=configureStore({reducer:{cart:persistedReducer},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:[FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER]}});}});export var persistor=persistStore(store);
